title: Phillips 66 CEO: Major Pipeline Project Has Broad Support
description: US federal and state officials are lining up with the oil industry to support a plan by Phillips 66 and Kinder Morgan Inc. to deliver gasoline to California via what could become the world’s largest fuel pipeline. Phillips 66 CEO Mark Lashier spoke with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld about the pipeline. (Source: Bloomberg)
